name: Adult White Dragon
movement: 40 ft., burrow 30 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: It has scales resembling icy surroundings, cold calculating eyes, and large wings covered in frost.
memorable: Known for its powerful icy breath that can encase enemies in ice and control the battlefield with cold effects.
goals: Typically hunts large prey like mammoths or polar bears and defends its territory aggressively.
relations: Often found in ice caves or glaciers, can be an adversary to players or allies to ice-based creatures.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage; exceptional durability and strength with high Constitution and damaging melee attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low Intelligence makes it easier to outsmart in social encounters; reliance on cold attacks might be ineffective against fire-resistant foes.
attacks: Multiattack includes a powerful bite that deals piercing and cold damage, two slashing claw attacks, and an immobile tail strike.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Breath can unleash a freezing blast in a 60-foot cone, dealing significant cold damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures nearby without needing visibility.
skills: Skilled in intimidation and perception, making it an effective ambusher with keen awareness.
additional_information: Can burrow through snow and ice, leaving no trace.
Employs legendary resistance to mitigate damage.
Creates regional effects linked to its icy domain.
Capable of physical attacks that can push enemies away.
Emits a numbing chill to slow down foes within proximity.
spellcasting: Can innately cast dominate beast, fire shield, animal friendship, and sleet storm without material components.
